keyboard.title: Keyboard Guide
keyboard.content: <dl><dt>Ctrl →</dt><dd>Next law</dd><dt>Ctrl ←</dt><dd>Prior law</dd><dt>Ctrl ↑</dt><dd>Up to parent</dd><dt>p</dt><dd>Pin this Law</dd></dl>

history.title: History
history.content: The history of a law lists when it was passed and amended by the legislature. If its number or identifier was changed, this may also be noted.
